subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Michael Cuddyer hit a tiebreaking single in the seventh inning and reliever Tyler Clippard and closer Jeurys Familia finished off Boston as the Mets avoided a three-game sweep.
snippet: Michael Cuddyer hit a tiebreaking single in the seventh inning and reliever Tyler Clippard and closer Jeurys Familia finished off Boston as the Mets avoided a three-game sweep.
